tha-ap99:1.3_0: Held is the best of hermits,
tha-ap99:10.1_0: The seventh section with honey and honey.
tha-ap99:2.1_0: When those great fires have become extinguished,
tha-ap99:2.4_0: sir, we’ve cut off the aggregates of the gods.
tha-ap99:4.1_0: I paid homage at the teacher’s feet,

tha-ap99:5.4_0: There is fruit of past deeds.

tha-ap99:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap99:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Madhurā.
